body.name: Comermax Big and Tall Home Office Desk Chairs for 400lb Heavy People, Ergonomic PU Leather Reclining Office Chair with Footrest and Wide Seat, Plus Size Managerial Executive Chairs (Coffee Brown)
features: 【FULLY RECLINING OFFICE CHAIR】Are you looking for an office chair that is able to go down to almost flat position? Then this model is a nice choice for you. The backrest can be freely adjusted from 90° to 170°, which means you'll have more options for resting positions. The retractable footrest is sure to make your napping time more pleasant and enjoyable.

【400LBS+ HEAVY DUTY OFFICE CHAIR】Distinct from those small models on the market, this managerial chair is specially designed for big and tall groups and looks much bigger than normal chairs. Adopting reinforced and upgraded chair base, our oversized office chair has an outstanding weight capacity exceeding 400lbs. More sturdy, durable and the user's safety is quite ensured.

【UNIQUE APPEARANCE】Both the backrest and cushion are designed in diamond-stitch pattern, which not only looks quite chic and disctinctive from the aesthetic aspect, but also helps to dissipate heat in terms of function. We firmly believe it would be a great gift for yourself or friend/family.

【EASY ASSEMBLY WITHIN 20MINS】To solve the assembly problem most customers may care about most, we provide you with a quite clear and professional manual to display each installation step. The chair can be easily assembled within 20mins even by a newbie. Product Dimensions-Size of Back: 30.9"X30.3"(LXW), Seat Area: 21.7"X20"(WxD), Seat Height: 19.3-22".

【PREMIUM QUALITY & BETTER SUPPORT】It's Kasorix team's ultimate goal to improve the user's working experience with our office chair. Upholstered in breathable PU leather, the chair has really comfortable sense of touch. Besides, both the backrest and cushion are thickened to offer extra support to human bodies. You'll never get tired of sitting on it even for extended working hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Big and Tall Reclining Office Chair 400lbs Fully Reclining Office Chair Big and Tall Reclining Office Chair Executive Office Chair with Flip-up Arms Executive Office Chair with Flip-up Arms Weight Capacity 400lbs(Oversize) 400lbs(Oversize) 400lbs(Oversize) 300lbs 300lbs Reclining Range 90-165° 90-165° 90-165° - - Rocking Function - - - 90-120° 90-120° Flip-up Arms - - - ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Executive Office Chair
reviews.reviewText: This is a very sturdy chair, and it's not very complicated to assemble. When I put it together, I found the material was quite good, very strong and durable. Best part, the metal base is better than other chair so it supports heavy weight. I'm quite satisfied. The cushion is soft and comfortable to lean on. The chair rotates easily, I used it for work and playing games. I don't get lower back pain from sitting too long. I'm happy with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and better for my back
reviews.reviewText: I sit in my chair a lot throughout the day from working and gaming and even though I’m only in my early twenties, the back pain is real! This chair is quite comfortable and actually helps a little with the pain in my lower back. It doesn’t make it completely go away because I have terrible posture and will often game for hours and hours, but the chair has a stable foundation and enough support where I can sit more comfortably and in different positions for a longer period of time. It’s still on the pricy side but I think it’s worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well built, bad instructions
reviews.reviewText: Hello recliner shoppers,I just received the chair today and wanted to review first day thoughts.The packaging was perfect. The box was smaller than I expected but was so well packaged that there wasn't a scratch anywhere.The instructions were inadequate. The drawings included were too small, the text too minimal. The installation video was more helpful but still missed steps. The two parts where the foot rest connects were not shown on the video and barely mentioned in the instructions. And it felt like, since they weren't really mentioned, I wasn't going to have the proper amount of bolts. Turns out I did and everything got put together perfectly. But, not in twenty minutes or even close to that. I'm not a complete waste of space but it took me some time.That said, this chair is well built. The pieces that the wheels attach to are heavy duty metal. It's not easy for me to get up from chairs so I use the arm rests as support, and there's not a single wobble. A nice touch is all of the bolts use the same size allen wrench... included... and the company gave us a decent one with a handle.The chair is really good looking.This chair does not rock. Check model numbers because reviews are for more than one model, and some do rock, but not this one, which is really unfortunate because I wanted a chair that rocked.I'll update this after I've had a chance to sit on it for extended periods of time, to recline, and I'll even force myself to take naps so I can test how comfortable that is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is not real leather, but has a nice feel to it. The chair is comfortable and for a quick 15 -25 min nap it is perfect. The foot rest is a bit challenging to pull out, but it holds up nicely. I would recommend it to family and friends. The levers adjust smoothly and quietly. It does a great job for the price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pros and Cons
reviews.reviewText: Pros: -Very sturdy, and the bolt holes mostly lined up to thread in the fasteners. -All the pieces were there, and they placed spares in case one was lost - Decent ventilated leather for the priceCons: - The 5 cent manual was missing pages. In order to assemble the armrest, I had to review the assembly video and guess. Fortunately I am a DIY guy, and I was able to figure it out. - The reclining aspect on the backrest is junk. It went back, but would not go back up. I played with it for 20 minutes or so, before it gave a loud snap, and went back in place. - Footrest - This is why we bought the chair... to help reduce swelling in lower extremities. Flimsy at best, held in place by rubber O-rings, and supported by plastic only. This was pre-installed, but I suspect I will be having to design a new bracket shortly.Notes: The comfort side was from my sitting, and the chair was bought for my wife. The neck support on the headrest should be fine for someone 5'6-5'9". I am taller than that... It would kill my upper back after a few hours.Conclusion: Pretty nice chair... overall good solid construction, with some significant flaws.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little weird but super comfy
reviews.reviewText: Took about 30 minutes to put together. I am 5’4 and at it’s lowest setting is to tall to comfortably sit in with feet on the floor. But the seat is perfect for my short self! I have an attached area so I can sit cross legged and this is wonderful for all the different ways to sit. I work from home and this chair is fantastic for that! The material is actually soft and smooth. For the price I’d like to say the options for hight should have been better and the seat back should have an option to stop the tilt. I’d think for anyone taller the actually shape of the seat would become obnoxious since it’s actually very short. Very weird mix… and heavy! Goodness be prepared this thing has weight to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice chair and super comfy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very professional looking and feeling office chair
reviews.reviewText: Simply put, I like this chair. Its heavy-duty even in the reclining position. I suggest you find a nice pillow to rest your head. The controls are easy to use and it is great for those who are in the office doing serious sitting
